FunctionOracle.name: func_std_grade
FunctionOracle.source:
CREATE OR REPLACE FUNCTION func_std_grade ( p_school_code VARCHAR2, p_batch_no DATE, p_class_code VARCHAR2, p_stream_code VARCHAR2, p_score_type VARCHAR2, p_mark_obtained NUMBER, p_max_mark NUMBER ) RETURN VARCHAR2 AS v_grade VARCHAR2(10); BEGIN CASE WHEN p_max_mark IS NULL THEN v_grade := '-NA-'; WHEN p_mark_obtained IS NULL THEN v_grade := '-ab-'; WHEN p_mark_obtained IS NOT NULL THEN CASE WHEN p_score_type = 'VALUE' THEN v_grade := round(p_mark_obtained); WHEN p_score_type = 'GRADE' THEN SELECT a.pseudo_name INTO v_grade FROM school_grade a WHERE a.status_name = 'ACTIVE' AND a.school_code = p_school_code AND a.batch_no# = p_batch_no AND a.class_code = p_class_code AND a.stream_code = p_stream_code AND round(p_mark_obtained / p_max_mark * 100) BETWEEN a.range_from AND a.range_upto; END CASE; END CASE;
---return value RETURN v_grade; END;
